reviews.title: Great value for the money
reviews.review_text: I bought two for a mobile dual monitor setup. These look great for the price. The only drawback is the weight, which I guess is normal but i have two and a laptop in my bag now so it adds up. Nice cover

reviews.title: On The Go Gaming
reviews.review_text: I first bought this Acer portable monitor for myself, and after seeing how much it improved my workflow, I immediately purchased a second one as a gift for a friend. The display is sharp, bright, and vibrant—perfect for both work and entertainment. It's lightweight, slim, and slips easily into a laptop bag, making it ideal for travel or working remotely. Setup couldn't be easier: just plug it in and you're ready to go. For me, it's been a total game-changer. Having a second screen on the go makes multitasking, presenting, and organizing so much smoother. My friend has been just as impressed with theirs, and it's already made a big difference in their day-to-day tasks. The build feels sturdy yet sleek, and Acer clearly prioritized both portability and performance. Honestly, I wouldn't hesitate to recommend this monitor to anyone who needs more screen space without being tied to a desk.

reviews.title: Nice product
reviews.review_text: Great screen if you are looking for something portable, like working out of the office. The case makes it very handy to carry and store. * You have to increase the brightness manually (just the first time), is set to the minimum by default. Don't expect as much brightness as a full size monitor, you won't get it but it's the expected since it does not require a power supply. Also wouldn't pay full price for it, get it on a discount.

reviews.title: great price and good quality screen
reviews.review_text: I had 8 hour meetings for 6 weeks going over new software, and having only my laptop screen wasn't going to cut it. This screen was a life saver and allowed me to have screens to reference material on. The screen is light but sturdy and fits into my laptop backpack with ease.

reviews.title: Light, Versatile, and Samsung DeX Ready
reviews.review_text: I use this portable monitor with Samsung DeX, and it works flawlessly. The charging passthrough keeps my phone powered the entire time, which is a huge plus. I also place it right on my piano stand to display sheet music, including interactive apps. I use this for teaching music as well as for my medical work, and it's been incredibly convenient, very light, and easy to carry in your backpack or laptop bag. I also use it with the GeForce Now cloud gaming service, and it delivers a smooth, responsive experience. With a Windows laptop, it works just as well, making it a great all-around second screen. The built-in speakers are pretty bad, but that's not what this monitor is for. The IPS display is bright, sharp, and has great viewing angles, making it perfect for small presentations or sharing content. The only thing I would suggest is for the screen cover protector to have some sort of latch or magnet to keep the sleeve closed snugly. If you need a lightweight, portable second screen that just works, this is an excellent choice.

reviews.title: Could've been good
reviews.review_text: First off, I ordered the onn. brand and this was substituted because it was out of stock. I needed something immediately so just had to go with it. Surprisingly the .onn brand has basically the same specs, some areas even better than this one, and it's cheaper, but I didn't get to try it out. CONS: 1. The tilt of the screen. There are only two tilt options and both of them are too tilted IMO. I don't want my computer screen to be leaned back, I want it upright in front of me. 2. The cover isn't magenetic. It flaps around and doesn't stay on the front of the screen. It is nice that it's attached permanently at the back so it doesn't come off completely, but I wish it was magnetic to keep the screen protected. PROS: 1. It was on sale for $88 so that's a pretty good deal. 2. You can use a single USB-C to for power and display on your laptop. I had another portable monitor with the same ports as this one, BUT I had to use the USB-C for power and a mini-HDMI for display. It's nice to only need one connection. Ultimately, this worked for me needing something quick and it would've been fine, but the tilt is a deal breaker for me.

reviews.title: X
reviews.review_text: I should have considered the other bad reviews, the screen worked for about a month and then started giving me all kinds of trouble. The problem is with the HDMI plug in port on the screen if I fight with it long enough I can eventually get it to work , but it has became so bad it's not worth the trouble. I purchased this after I dropped my Acer Aspire 3 from about 10" off the ground on to a carpet floor and the screen broke. I won't be purchasing anything from Acer again.

reviews.title: Too many cords. Not one cord connection.
reviews.review_text: This statement is not true. I have to connect the HDMI and the USB -C cables in order for it to work. It is like the USB-C cable is the power and the HDMI is the picture. I understand computer hook up's but am I missing something???? Clutter-Free Usage - Declutter your life and keep things simple with this single-cable solution. One USB-C cable hooks up your PM1 Series display to a laptop, sharing your display and transferring data while also supplying power. With this super-handy cable, you can also connect to your smartphone or tablet. I like the picture quality. There are just way too many cords. One is fine, but two is one too many when you add in the laptop power cord.

It would not connect to my computer. I tried all options for connection. I couldn't find any info compatability and am assuming it just was not the correct accessory for my DELl. It was a nice size and would have been perfect for what I needed, had it connected.

reviews.title: Returning not good
reviews.review_text: Not a good product. Only works on the USB-C to USB-C plug, the hdmi and usb a to C doesn't work. Can't turn the screen brightness up because it says there isn't sufficient power.

reviews.title: Don't get this
reviews.review_text: Don't get this overpriced, portable monitor. There are better ones, and my issue with it is that you can only have it either face your forehead or the ceiling, instead of, idk maybe have it be able to face you. The picture is alright and if you have a setup where you are looking down at a 45-degree angle, then maybe this is for you but there are still better ones to get.

the attachment to the monitor will not sit straight. the monitor leans and unable to see the monitor without almost having to stand to see it. do not buy this monitor. I regret it and had to purchase anoyher monitor this one was so bad. someone said they think the attachment to the monitor to hold the monitor on table was placed on backwards. do not buy this one.

reviews.title: Great Monitor for the money!
reviews.review_text: So far looks good and is a good value for the money, comes with interface cable, ready to use. Would probably rate higher after a longer period of use!

the screen looks very good and is very responsive, but I swear they made it upside down as the menu is on the wrong side of the screen. The screen also does not sit up on its stand very well. otherwise, it's a good light screen.

reviews.title: Portable, great price, and easy to use
reviews.review_text: The monitor works with no external power. With power, the brightness is great. I got it for under $100 and for the price it's a great portable monitor with a cover. The monitor is extremely fast to setup and easy to use. My only real gripe is the magnet cover/stand doesn't always grip appropriately, and it makes me nervous if it were to fall. The resolution is not the best, nor are the speakers, but the portability, price, and fast setup easily over-ride the negatives for me. For my needs, it's perfect.

reviews.title: Amazing and very portable
reviews.review_text: Hi I'm a truck driver and I play a lot of video games I have a gaming lap top and a PS5 when I say this monitor is a game changer it's great with battery life portability graphically immersive and awesomely portable I can't say how much I love this device also I got it on sale for $88 when it's usually over 200 thanks for reading my review if you play video games and are looking for a portable monitor then look no further than the ACER!

reviews.title: The Acer portable monitor is a great find.
reviews.review_text: I love having a large screen for my phone. I can sit at the table and have a keyboard hooked up to my phone and it's like turning it into a wonderful extra computer. The colors are great, has a very sharp resolution and the picture quality is very good.

amazing. worked perfect while I was on vacation and needed to check in with the office. I normally use two 24-in monitors in my home office but my laptop is only 14 in when I added this monitor to my laptop the setup worked perfectly for what I needed. very lightweight and easy to my laptop bag

Clear and crisp image. perfect for gaming or work. I bought one as an additional monitor for flight sim instruments panel. But the quality is good enough use as the main monitor as well. So, getting a second one.

This computer extender was used for a business trip. It extended my laptop screen to have an additional screen. It worked perfectly fine. It folds down like a tablet, so it was convenient to carry in a laptop bag. It was perfect for me

The design is sleek and i likes it because ot was slim and lightqeight. Through looking at youtube reviews, i saw it was mainly used with laptops that took usb so i had bought a sub to vga adapter prior just in case. when i plug the provided usb cord into my phone, it turns on the monitor but says no signal. fine. so i pkug it into my computer with the provided usb c to usb a cord and still the same thing. i then plug in the usb c to vga adapter at the same time and still the same thing. i played around with all their cords before just returning it. Maybe im running a old computer but i think the compatibility of what it can be used with should be more clear. ended uo getting a onn 22 inch monitir and though not as sleek, its cheaper, light and has more options for input. worked on the first try. unless youre tech savvy and know what youre buying, i wouldnt buy this portable monitor.

reviews.title: Dual-screen experience on the go
reviews.review_text: I recently purchased the Acer portable screen to use as a second monitor while traveling, and overall, it has been a mixed experience. Pros: - The screen has a sleek and modern design, making it a nice addition to my workspace. - Picture quality is impressive, with clear and vibrant visuals. - It comes with three cables for connectivity: Mini HDMI to HDMI, USB-C to USB-A, and USB-C to USB-C, which is great for versatility. Cons: - Unfortunately, I couldn't get the Mini HDMI to HDMI or USB-C to USB-A cables to work with my laptop. I tried both through my Thunderbolt dock and a direct connection, but neither worked. - The only cable that successfully connected the screen to my laptop was the USB-C to USB-C cable. The same issue occurred when I tested it with my work laptop. While the screen itself is great in terms of design and display quality, the connectivity issues were disappointing even after updating the screen driver. If your laptop supports USB-C, this could be a great travel companion. However, if you rely on Mini HDMI or USB-C to USB-A, you may run into problems.

reviews.title: Works well enough
reviews.review_text: I'm using it between an m1 macbook and a lenovo laptop via a single usb c without issue and, a third laptop with usb and hdmi. The colors are a little matte and there's pretty much one viewing angle. That said, it's not great for gaming although the refresh rate is fine. As a second or third work display, it's perfectly fine.

reviews.title: The color and resolution was more than I expected.
reviews.review_text: The Monitor is powered by USB connection I am using the Mini HDMI to HDMI cable, and USB A TO USB C to power. Monitor came with several cables Mini HDMI to HDMI; USB C to USB C; USB A to USB C. That wasn't clear in the description of monitor. That was pleasing. The color and resolution was more than I expected. It provides a excellent 1080p resolution. The price is very competitive with other retailers. I ordered online and had them bring monitor out to my car. I didn't even know they were carried in my store until I looked online. I would buy this again.

reviews.title: SCAM! They sent a refurbished monitor!
reviews.review_text: Bait and Switch! I purchased what was advertised as a new monitor from Wal Mart. What I received was a refurbished monitor from "East Coast Entities". It even has a sticker that says that it is refurbished; it came without any instructions or warranty information; the cord was wrapped up with a rubber band- none of this was in plastic as all new hardware comes in. This is clearly a used/returned/repaired product. I emailed the seller. Their reply: "Hi, thank you for your message. This item is 100% brand new and unused in the package. We wanted to let you know that only the standard 30-day warranty is applicable for purchases made through Walmart". (Acer's website states that their products have a one year warranty so this seller is simply stating Walmart's return policy). This is a BAIT AND SWITCH SCAM! I will be returning this to Walmart today.

reviews.title: LOVE IT!!
reviews.review_text: If your thinking about it, GET IT!! I was truely impressed by this product. The screen itself is very crisp and very easy on the eyes. this is exactly what i was looking for because I need this to study for school. the cool thing about this monitor is i can hook it up to my 2 in 1 chromebook and it does not drain the battery! it actually will charge during hibernation but while in use it wont drain. this is very important because i only have one port on my chromebook! so ill be able to use this monitor at school with no problem. Im very excited! I also was surprised to find out there are speakers on the monitor. they are not super loud but pretty cool they have built in speakers. this screen is perfect for gaming too!! a kid or teenager WOULD love this as a gift. or a student entering college! i recommend this product.

reviews.title: Convenient Yes Features Eh
reviews.review_text: Convenience moves this to 4 stars. The display tilt is at a too laid back angle. The buttons to control the functionality are confusing and inconsistent. The battery drains quick unless you keep it so dark it's unreadable. Too many other options for these online to be forced to deal with these inconveniences. With all that, the picture is great and the portability of these devices is great.

reviews.title: not as expected for price and works correct haime.
reviews.review_text: it's a very thin slick device. very convenient. but that's about were the good things end. from what I found is very overpriced. it does not have touch. no operating system. and does not just easily connect from sea to Sea port from your phone to monitor and work all the time. sometimes I have to jump through a bunch of hoops just to get it to connect. again it's very slick and portable. but it's not at all worth the price of over $100. I found much better products with touching other selling points for much less.

reviews.title: So great!!
reviews.review_text: I mean I've only had it for a day but I'm on a time crunch for work and this portable monitor saved me so much time %26 frustration. When I'm working on a large project like this I feel like I'm constantly getting confused and mixed up if I'm only on my laptop but this was a lifesaver. It took me a minute to figure out which cord worked best with my laptop but since then it's been spot on. It's extremely bright and clear and for only $80 I'm trying to talk myself out of getting another one. But I do realize I'm only a day in but so far I love it!!!
This is not what I thought I was ordering I don't need a portable monitor I thought I was getting a small computer
There us difficulty with keeping the monitor upright on the platform. You will have to keep adjusting it to get it to stay upright which is a bit frustrating. Overall the picture is great.
I've had a couple of these already. My kids borrow them and never return them. The previous one were purchased via Amazon at a higher price and longer delivery time.
Acer is OEM for so many products. I felt safe ordering this. Its working great and is exactly as described. Its light weight, I will carry it with me in my bag all the time.

reviews.title: Perfect
reviews.review_text: Purchased this for my wife for when she has to leave the office and work from home. The picture is perfect and the setup is easy and simple. I think that I hit a home run with this one.

Buy it so you can take it to the trips with me, it comes with its respective protective cover, the necessary cables, the price is very accessible to everyone and the quality and size are too good, I am more than satisfied.

reviews.title: useful screen.
reviews.review_text: Cheap price. Works vey well. Bright screen. Cords could gave been longer to use on right sude of laptop.

reviews.title: Portable monitor
reviews.review_text: I took this to California desert and hooked it up to my PS5 I will say this is one of the better portable screens I've gotten I definitely recommend

reviews.title: A perfect second monitor for home
reviews.review_text: The quality and resolution are perfect; like having two laptop screens. We mounted it into a pole arm and looks great.

reviews.title: Very Pleased
reviews.review_text: I have used this monitor for a couple of days as a second screen in my pickup and has worked great. Compact design and came with cables for pretty much any connection option.

It worked right out of the box. Both volume and screen brightness are good. It doesn't come with a usb block however, which lead me to try and find a compatible block. It took a bit of digging to find the required amperage.

reviews.title: Can't beat the price! Love this tv/ monitor
reviews.review_text: Love this monitor or T.v. Can split screen my phone or pc, even able to use a Roku with a battery pack to enjoy some T.v time! Kids love using it for a back seat monitor!
screen never came on. the screen doesn't stand very well.
Its not the best angle for a portable monitor, but it works well, I use it daily.
Absolutely not what I expected and returned it the same day!
It was good but it's not the best. Could purchase better for a little more
Would have to be perfect for 5 stars, it came in late
Bought as a gift for a friend who wanted it and got an amazing deal, quick shipping. Everything went amazing.
I travel 3 weeks a month for business and this is exactly what I needed to make my work easier. Not to mention the price was great!

when I opened it up to connect to the laptop that I ordered from Walmart I saw that the screen is cracked

the screen is good, but it takes 2 wires to both connect and give power. Other brands can do both with one cord.

reviews.review_text: Very good. I have it plugged into my MacBook docking station to expand the screens. No need of power outlet, all it takes is USB-C to power and HDMI to mini-HDMI for the video. No complaint at all.
I like the Acer portable monitor. What I don't like is you cannot position the monitor straight up on the built in stand, it has to sit up with a tilt.

reviews.title: Do not trust Walmart electronics
reviews.review_text: The folding cover/kickstand does not keep the monitor propped up well. It kept falling over. When I returned it the customer reps noted the serial number didn't match the box, the one on the monitor was coming up a display model but I bought it in an unopened factory-sealed box, implying shady behavior on their vendor's part. Buyer beware. At least they gave me a refund.

Very easy to use, affordable option, and overall a good product

reviews.title: perfect for portable usage
reviews.review_text: very handy, easy to set up

reviews.title: portable monitor review
reviews.review_text: My debate was to get and install a new screen on my five year old laptop or get this portable screen that I use with other setups in the future. I made the right choice. It's considerably brighter than OEM screen at 250 nits so I'm good with the setting at only 80%. Good color and contrast. The push button controls are a bit wonky but workable. Plug and play on my Dell Latitude 5590 using USB type C connector. I have not tried the mini HDMI or regular USB to type C interface. All three come in the box. Printed instructions are minimal, but if you're at this stage, you probably don't need them. Excellent product and I've shown co-workers who would enjoy setting up dual screens on the cheap at home as well, with many saying they intend to purchase as well.

reviews.title: Great little portable monitor
reviews.review_text: So fare so good, I like it as us really thin and works great to add a monitor in small places when traveling!! Perfect for what I need it for!!

reviews.title: Great size
reviews.review_text: Screen works great and fits in my backpack

reviews.title: Great Portable Monitor!!
reviews.review_text: [This review was collected as part of a promotion.] Works like a charm! Has been super helpful this summer as I work remotely and have been traveling to see family/friends. Super easy to set up, good quality, and easy to travel with. Took me a little bit to figure out how to stand it up but I eventually figured it out. Very happy with this monitor.

reviews.title: I found the Acer 15.6" LED Portable Monitor very convenient
reviews.review_text: [This review was collected as part of a promotion.] The monitor is really user-friendly: lightweight, thin, and easily fits into a laptop bag. The image quality is top-notch with Full HD resolution and vibrant colors. However, it remains unclear to me how to connect it without a computer. If the monitor can only be used with a computer, this somewhat limits its functionality. But overall, it is a very practical thing that will be useful in many situations. Additionally, the price is quite reasonable for the features it offers.

reviews.title: Great value, convenient!
reviews.review_text: [This review was collected as part of a promotion.] Fantastic external monitor so easy to connect to your phone or computer! Screen is clear so no strain on your eyes. The wrap around protective flap is nice and foubles as a stand! Hubby was very pleased as well. Comes with all the connection cords needed.

reviews.title: It is a big and clear screen so you can see things
reviews.review_text: [This review was collected as part of a promotion.] I love the portable monitor it helped me so much with my work and my class work. It was such a big screen and it showed and displayed everything so nicely. You should really get this product it is definitely a 10 out of 10.

reviews.title: Perfect for travel and easy to use
reviews.review_text: [This review was collected as part of a promotion.] The Acer portable monitor works great. No power supply needed just attached straight to my Mac book pro using the usb c adapter that comes with the monitor and worked perfectly. It's definitely a great alternative to a stand alone monitor and has been working well for the past week.

reviews.title: Lightweight and good quality display
reviews.review_text: [This review was collected as part of a promotion.] I received this portal monitor after wanting one for some time and this one is really great. It mirrors my screen or I can use it as an extension of my screen. I have used it with my laptop, phone, and even iPad but I needed to purchase extra cords and connections for it that I could only buy online. The monitor is super lightweight perfect for my work bag and traveling and I like the built in stand that keeps it upright. The display is really clear and bright I would recommend but you might need to purchase additional connection cables than what it comes with.

reviews.title: Work from home essential!!!
reviews.review_text: [This review was collected as part of a promotion.] This portable monitor is a godsend for those who are wfh. Once you work with dual screens there is no turning back and this portable monitor makes it so easy to slip in your work bag when you're on the move. The resolution is bright and crisp, making it a joy to work with.

reviews.title: Awesome
reviews.review_text: [This review was collected as part of a promotion.] Absolutely love this monitor! The display is amazing! My son loves that he can take it anywhere and play on a bigger screen. The case/cover is good and does what it's supposed to do, but could always use something more sturdy.

reviews.title: The cat loves it!
reviews.review_text: [This review was collected as part of a promotion.] This monitor is perfect for me and my cat! When I am trying to work on my college homework, I simply slide over and put on a video for my cat, the sound and picture quality is perfect and keeps his attention well!

reviews.title: Great quality portable monitor!
reviews.review_text: [This review was collected as part of a promotion.] I was extremely grateful to receive this product from Influenster! I've used Acer products before but this one is by far the best. It's very handy if you need 2 screens for work, school, or even gaming! It's small enough to fit in a backpack and picture is crystal clear. It is a well made, good quality product that doesn't break the bank.

reviews.title: Portable plug and play monitor
reviews.review_text: [This review was collected as part of a promotion.] Acer 15.6" Portable Monitor is lightweight and comes with a mini HDMI to HDMI cable and a USB-C to USB-C cable. It is simple to connect to your laptop. A USB-C cable is needed to power up the monitor so you cannot use it without one. The HDMI cable allows you to play videos etc but will not power up the monitor. I was hoping to find a way to use this with my phone but no luck so far. It is slim so it easily fits into a backpack with your laptop. This would definitely come in handy to keep 2 kids occupied!

reviews.title: It's ideal for my compact workspace
reviews.review_text: [This review was collected as part of a promotion.] I recently got the PM1 series monitor, and it's perfect for my small office and lightweight needs. It fits easily into my bag and is easy to carry anywhere. It's ideal for my compact workspace, taking up minimal desk space, and is excellent as a secondary monitor during presentations. The vibrant images are fantastic, the instructions are easy to follow, and the single-cable simplicity makes it incredibly convenient to use. Highly recommended for anyone looking for a portable and versatile monitor!

reviews.title: Durable, Portable, Multiple connection types!
reviews.review_text: [This review was collected as part of a promotion.] The design has a nice look and feel and it's durable enough to protect the screen when in transit. I like that it comes with hdmi and usb-c so I can easily use with multiple outlets! I didn't love the way it stands in the case and it took a few minutes to figure it out. However, I'm sure it will become easier over time and not be an issue at all. This is really helpful when traveling for work/school!

reviews.title: Very convenient
reviews.review_text: [This review was collected as part of a promotion.] The screen is high quality, small enough t to definitely take with me wherever I go and fits in my laptop bag which is a plus. Seems to be very durable and it was super easy to connect.

reviews.title: Love it
reviews.review_text: [This review was collected as part of a promotion.] I really like this! The display quality in portability is amazing, the connectivity is really easy, it's very durable and the price is really reasonable!

reviews.title: Good quality!
reviews.review_text: [This review was collected as part of a promotion.] I received this from Influenser for an honest review! Display quality is good, connecting is fine, seems quit durable nice and thin for travel! Price is just right. Would recommend this to others!

reviews.title: Don't know howi worked withiut it
reviews.review_text: [This review was collected as part of a promotion.] This portable monitor makes working on the go a breeze. It's lightweight and durable. Connects with a single usb c and is bright enough to use outside.

reviews.title: Worth the money
reviews.review_text: [This review was collected as part of a promotion.] This is a very nice and large display monitor. It shows the picture nice and clear. It's also made from acer which is a good company. I really like how it is thin but the screen is large.
